description:
8.17 adynamicsmooth
Apply dynamic smoothing to input audio stream.

A description of the accepted options follows.
name: adynamicsmooth

parameters.description: Set an amount of sensitivity to frequency fluctations. Default is 2. Allowed range is from 0 to 1e+06.
parameters.name: sensitivity

parameters.description: Set a base frequency for smoothing. Default value is 22050. Allowed range is from 2 to 1e+06.
parameters.name: basefreq

source:
8.17 adynamicsmooth

Apply dynamic smoothing to input audio stream.

A description of the accepted options follows.

sensitivity

Set an amount of sensitivity to frequency fluctations. Default is 2. Allowed range is from 0 to 1e+06.

basefreq

Set a base frequency for smoothing. Default value is 22050. Allowed range is from 2 to 1e+06.
